title: Textile, 18th century
medium:
Medium: linen warp, cotton weft
Technique: plain weave foundation. Block-printed: black, red and yellow. Blue applied by brush over yellow for a dull greenish-blue.
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (two pieces joined): 38 x 20 cm (14 15/16 x 7 7/8 in.)
Repeat H x W: 24.8 x 17.8 cm (9 3/4 x 7 in.)
description: Fragment of a bold floral pattern on a "picotage" background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: linen warp, cotton weft
Technique: plain weave foundation. Block-printed: black, red and yellow. Blue applied by brush over yellow for a dull greenish-blue.. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-91.
